trans-unit.source: rotation_period - (Optional) Every time this period passes, generate a new CryptoKeyVersion and set it as the primary. The first rotation will take place after the specified period. The rotation period has the format of a decimal number with up to 9 fractional digits, followed by the letter s (seconds). It must be greater than a day (ie, 83400).
trans-unit.target: rotation_period -（可选）每次经过此时间段时，都生成一个新的CryptoKeyVersion并将其设置为主。第一次旋转将在指定时间段后进行。轮换周期的格式为十进制数字，最多9个小数位，后跟字母s（秒）。它必须大于一天（即83400）。

trans-unit.source: routing_config - (Optional) The Lambda alias' route configuration settings. Fields documented below
trans-unit.target: routing_config -（可选）Lambda别名的路由配置设置。下面记录的字段

trans-unit.source: routing_key - (Optional) A routing key for the binding.
trans-unit.target: routing_key -（可选）绑定的路由键。

trans-unit.source: routing_mode - (Optional) Sets the network-wide routing mode for Cloud Routers to use. Accepted values are "GLOBAL" or "REGIONAL". Defaults to "REGIONAL". Refer to the Cloud Router documentation for more details.
trans-unit.target: routing_mode -（可选）设置云路由器要使用的网络范围的路由模式。可接受的值为 "GLOBAL" 或 "REGIONAL" 。默认为 "REGIONAL" 。有关更多详细信息，请参考 Cloud Router文档。

trans-unit.source: routing_policy - (Optional) The routing policy that you want to apply to all records that Route 53 creates when you register an instance and specify the service. Valid Values: MULTIVALUE, WEIGHTED
trans-unit.target: routing_policy -（可选）要在注册实例并指定服务时应用于Route 53创建的所有记录的路由策略。有效值：MULTIVALUE，加权

trans-unit.source: routing_rules - (Optional) A json array containing routing rules describing redirect behavior and when redirects are applied.
trans-unit.target: routing_rules -（可选）一个json数组，其中包含描述重定向行为以及何时应用重定向的路由规则。

trans-unit.source: routing_strategy - (Required) Specifies the fleet and/or routing type to use for the alias.
trans-unit.target: routing_strategy -（必需）指定要用于别名的队列和/或路由类型。

trans-unit.source: routing_weight - (Optional) The routing weight. Defaults to 10.
trans-unit.target: routing_weight -（可选）路由权重。默认为 10 。

trans-unit.source: row - (Required) Row position of widget from top left, starting at 1.
trans-unit.target: row -（必需）小部件从左上方开始的行位置，从 1 开始。

trans-unit.source: row_index_stride - (Optional) The number of rows between index entries. The default is 10000 and the minimum is 1000.
trans-unit.target: row_index_stride -（可选）索引条目之间的行数。默认值为 10000 ，最小值为 1000 。

trans-unit.source: row_tag - (Required) The XML tag designating the element that contains each record in an XML document being parsed. Note that this cannot identify a self-closing element (closed by />). An empty row element that contains only attributes can be parsed as long as it ends with a closing tag (for example, <row item_a="A" item_b="B"></row> is okay, but <row item_a="A" item_b="B" /> is not).
trans-unit.target: row_tag -（必需）XML标签，该元素指定包含要解析的XML文档中的每个记录的元素。请注意，这不能标识自动关闭的元素（用 /> 封闭）。只要包含结束 <row item_a="A" item_b="B"></row> 的空行元素都可以解析，只要它以结束标记结尾即可（例如， <row item_a =“ A” item_b =“ B”> </ row>可以，但是 <row item_a="A" item_b="B" /> 不是）。

trans-unit.source: rpm_list - (Optional) List of specific RPMs to mirror.
trans-unit.target: rpm_list -（可选）要镜像的特定RPM列表。

trans-unit.source: rps - (Optional) RPS limit to apply when making calls to the API. Default: 4. This can also be specified with the CLOUDFLARE_RPS shell environment variable.
trans-unit.target: rps -（可选）在调用API时适用的RPS限制。默认值：4。也可以使用 CLOUDFLARE_RPS shell环境变量来指定。

trans-unit.source: rrdatas - (Required) The string data for the records in this record set whose meaning depends on the DNS type. For TXT record, if the string data contains spaces, add surrounding \" if you don't want your string to get split on spaces.
trans-unit.target: rrdatas -（必需）此记录集中记录的字符串数据，其含义取决于DNS类型。对于TXT记录，如果字符串数据包含空格，则如果不希望字符串在空格上分割，请添加 \" 。

trans-unit.source: rsa_bits - (Optional) When algorithm is "RSA", the size of the generated RSA key in bits. Defaults to 2048.
trans-unit.target: rsa_bits -（可选）当 algorithm 为“ RSA”时，生成的RSA密钥的大小（以位为单位）。默认为2048。

trans-unit.source: rsadecrypt(string, key) - Decrypts string using RSA. The padding scheme PKCS #1 v1.5 is used. The string must be base64-encoded. key must be an RSA private key in PEM format. You may use file() to load it from a file.
trans-unit.target: rsadecrypt(string, key) -使用RSA解密 string 。使用填充方案PKCS＃1 v1.5。该 string 必须是base64编码的。 key 必须是PEM格式的RSA私钥。您可以使用 file() 从文件中加载它。

trans-unit.source: ruby_version - (Optional) The version of Ruby to use. Defaults to "2.0.0".
trans-unit.target: ruby_version -（可选）要使用的Ruby版本。默认为“ 2.0.0”。

trans-unit.source: rubygems_version - (Optional) The version of RubyGems to use. Defaults to "2.2.2".
trans-unit.target: rubygems_version -（可选）要使用的RubyGems版本。默认为“ 2.2.2”。

trans-unit.source: rule - (Optional) A list of rules to be applied in this section. each rule has the following arguments:
trans-unit.target: rule -（可选）本节中要应用的规则列表。每个规则具有以下参数：

trans-unit.source: rule - (Optional) A rule describing how the security group operates. The rule object structure is documented below. Changing this updates the security group rules. As shown in the example above, multiple rule blocks may be used.
trans-unit.target: rule -（可选）描述安全组如何运行的规则。规则对象结构记录在下面。更改此设置将更新安全组规则。如上面的示例所示，可以使用多个规则块。

trans-unit.source: rule - (Optional) Can be specified multiple times. Each rule block supports fields documented below. If managed = false at least one rule is required!
trans-unit.target: rule -（可选）可以多次指定。每个规则块都支持下面记录的字段。如果 managed = false ，则至少需要一条规则！

trans-unit.source: rule - (Optional) Configures a firewall rule; see Rules below for details.
trans-unit.target: rule -（可选）配置防火墙规则；有关详细信息，请参见下面的规则。

trans-unit.source: rule - (Optional) The set of rules that belong to this policy. There must always be a default rule (rule with priority 2147483647 and match "*"). If no rules are provided when creating a security policy, a default rule with action "allow" will be added. Structure is documented below.
trans-unit.target: rule -（可选）属于此策略的一组规则。必须始终有一个默认规则（优先级为2147483647且匹配“ *”的规则）。如果在创建安全策略时未提供任何规则，则将添加带有操作“允许”的默认规则。结构记录在下面。

trans-unit.source: rule - (Required) A list of authentication plugins that the user must authenticate with.
trans-unit.target: rule -（必需）用户必须使用其进行身份验证的身份验证插件的列表。

trans-unit.source: rule - (Required) An Escalation rule block. Escalation rules documented below.
trans-unit.target: rule -（必需）升级规则块。升级规则记录在下面。

trans-unit.source: rule - (Required) Can be specified multiple times. Each rule block supports fields documented below.
trans-unit.target: rule -（必需）可以多次指定。每个规则块都支持下面记录的字段。

trans-unit.source: rule - (Required) The name of the rule you want to add targets to.
trans-unit.target: rule -（必填）要将目标添加到的规则的名称。

trans-unit.source: rule - (Required) The rules to associate with the web ACL and the settings for each rule.
trans-unit.target: rule -（必需）与Web ACL关联的规则以及每个规则的设置。

trans-unit.source: rule - (required) A single object for server-side encryption by default configuration. (documented below)
trans-unit.target: rule -（必需）默认配置下用于服务器端加密的单个对象。（在下面记录）

trans-unit.source: rule - (string, Required) The firewall rule described using the Cloud API rule syntax defined at https://docs.joyent.com/public-cloud/network/firewall/cloud-firewall-rules-reference. Note: Cloud API will normalize rules based on case-sensitivity, parentheses, ordering of IP addresses, etc. This can result in Terraform updating rules repeatedly if the rule definition differs from the normalized value.
trans-unit.target: rule -（字符串，必需）使用在 https://docs.joyent.com/public-cloud/network/firewall/cloud-firewall-rules-reference上定义的Cloud API规则语法描述的防火墙规则。注意：Cloud API将基于区分大小写，括号，IP地址的顺序等来规范化规则。如果规则定义与规范化值不同，这可能会导致Terraform更新规则重复。

trans-unit.source: rule - A security rule definition (see below). The security rule ordering will match how they appear in the terraform plan file.
trans-unit.target: rule -安全规则定义（请参阅下文）。安全规则的顺序将与它们在Terraform计划文件中的显示方式匹配。

trans-unit.source: rule - The security rule definition (see below). The security rule ordering will match how they appear in the terraform plan file.

trans-unit.target: rule -请参见上面的参数参考。

trans-unit.target: rule_action -（必需）指示是允许还是拒绝与规则匹配的流量。接受的值： allow | deny

trans-unit.source: rule_number - (Required) The rule number for the entry (for example, 100). ACL entries are processed in ascending order by rule number.
trans-unit.target: rule_number -（必填）条目的规则号（例如100）。ACL条目按规则编号升序处理。

trans-unit.source: rule_priority - The priority of the rule which is ascending, valid range [0-2147483647]. If multiple rules have the same priority, evaluation sequence is undefined.
trans-unit.target: rule_priority -规则的优先级，升序，有效范围[0-2147483647]。如果多个规则具有相同的优先级，则评估顺序不确定。

trans-unit.target: rule_set_name -（必需）规则集的名称

trans-unit.target: rulebase -（可选）规则库。这可以是 pre-rulebase （默认）， post-rulebase 或 rulebase 。

trans-unit.source: rulebase - (Optional, Deprecated) The rulebase. For firewalls, there is only the rulebase value (default), but on Panorama, there is also pre-rulebase and post-rulebase.
trans-unit.target: rulebase -（可选，不建议使用）规则库。对于防火墙，仅存在 rulebase 值（默认值），但在Panorama上，还存在 pre-rulebase 和 post-rulebase 。

trans-unit.source: rules - (Optional) A list of rules for determining failure conditions. Job Rules are documented below.
trans-unit.target: rules -（可选）确定故障条件的规则列表。作业规则记录在下面。

trans-unit.source: run_as_non_root - (Optional) Indicates that the container must run as a non-root user. If true, the Kubelet will validate the image at runtime to ensure that it does not run as UID 0 (root) and fail to start the container if it does.
trans-unit.target: run_as_non_root -（可选）指示容器必须以非root用户身份运行。如果为true，则Kubelet将在运行时验证映像，以确保它不以UID 0（根）的身份运行，并且如果启动，则无法启动容器。

trans-unit.source: run_as_user - (Optional) The UID to run the entrypoint of the container process. Defaults to user specified in image metadata if unspecified
trans-unit.target: run_as_user -（可选）用于运行容器进程入口点的UID。如果未指定，则默认为图像元数据中指定的用户

trans-unit.source: run_command_targets - (Optional) Parameters used when you are using the rule to invoke Amazon EC2 Run Command. Documented below. A maximum of 5 are allowed.
trans-unit.target: run_command_targets -（可选）使用规则调用Amazon EC2运行命令时使用的参数。记录在下面。最多允许5个。

trans-unit.source: run_for_each_node: (Optional) Boolean controlling whether the job is run only once (false, the default) or whether it is run once for each node (true).
trans-unit.target: run_for_each_node ：（可选）布尔值，控制该作业是否仅运行一次（ false ，默认值）或是否对每个节点运行一次（ true ）。

trans-unit.source: run_list - (Optional) List of strings to set as the run list for any nodes that belong to this role.

trans-unit.source: run_list (array) - (Optional) A list with recipes that will be invoked during the initial Chef Client run. The run-list will also be saved to the Chef Server after a successful initial run. Required if use_policyfile is false; ignored when use_policyfile is true (see named_run_list to specify a run-list defined in a Policyfile).
trans-unit.target: run_list (array) -（可选）带有食谱的列表，将在初始Chef Client运行期间调用这些食谱。成功完成初始运行后，运行列表还将保存到Chef服务器。如果 use_policyfile 为 false ，则为必需；否则为 false。当 use_policyfile 为 true 时将被忽略（请参阅 named_run_list 以指定策略文件中定义的运行列表）。

trans-unit.source: run_once_command_list - (Optional) A list of commands to run at first user logon, after guest customization.

trans-unit.target: run_probes -（可选）布尔值，用于为此池运行探针。默认值： true 。

trans-unit.source: s3_access_key - (Required) AWS Access Key of an account with the required permissions to post logs. You can provide this key via an environment variable, FASTLY_S3_ACCESS_KEY.

trans-unit.source: s3_backup_mode - (Optional) The Amazon S3 backup mode. Valid values are Disabled and Enabled. Default value is Disabled.

You must specify a bucket policy that allows ACM PCA to write the CRL to your bucket.

trans-unit.source: s3_force_path_style - (Optional) Set this to true to force the request to use path-style addressing, i.e., http://s3.amazonaws.com/BUCKET/KEY. By default, the S3 client will use virtual hosted bucket addressing, http://BUCKET.s3.amazonaws.com/KEY, when possible. Specific to the Amazon S3 service.

trans-unit.source: s3_secret_key - (Required) AWS Secret Key of an account with the required permissions to post logs. It is strongly recommended you create a separate IAM user with permissions to only operate on this Bucket. This secret will be not be encrypted. You can provide this secret via an environment variable, FASTLY_S3_SECRET_KEY.
trans-unit.target: s3_secret_key -（必需）具有发布日志所需权限的账户的AWS密钥。这是强烈建议您创建一个单独的IAM用户有权限只有在这个桶运行。此机密不会被加密。您可以通过环境变量 FASTLY_S3_SECRET_KEY 提供此机密。

trans-unit.source: s3_settings - (Optional) Settings for the target S3 endpoint. Available settings are service_access_role_arn, external_table_definition, csv_row_delimiter (default: \\n), csv_delimiter (default: ,), bucket_folder, bucket_name and compression_type (default: NONE). For more details, see Using Amazon S3 as a Target for AWS Database Migration Service.
trans-unit.target: s3_settings -（可选）目标S3端点的设置。可用设置包括 service_access_role_arn ， external_table_definition ， csv_row_delimiter （默认值： \\n ）， csv_delimiter （默认值： , ）， bucket_folder ， bucket_name 和 compression_type （默认值： NONE ）。有关更多详细信息，请参阅将Amazon S3用作AWS数据库迁移服务的目标。

trans-unit.source: scaling_adjustment - (Optional) The number of instances by which to scale. adjustment_type determines the interpretation of this number (e.g., as an absolute number or as a percentage of the existing Auto Scaling group size). A positive increment adds to the current capacity and a negative value removes from the current capacity.
trans-unit.target: scaling_adjustment （可选）按比例缩放的实例数。 adjustment_type 确定此数字的解释（例如，绝对数字或现有Auto Scaling组大小的百分比）。正增量将增加当前容量，负值将从当前容量中删除。

trans-unit.source: scaling_adjustment - (Required) The number of members by which to scale, when the adjustment bounds are breached. A positive value scales up. A negative value scales down.

trans-unit.source: scsi_controller_count - (Optional) The number of SCSI controllers that Terraform manages on this virtual machine. This directly affects the amount of disks you can add to the virtual machine and the maximum disk unit number. Note that lowering this value does not remove controllers. Default: 1.
trans-unit.target: scsi_controller_count -（可选）Terraform在此虚拟机上管理的SCSI控制器的数量。这直接影响您可以添加到虚拟机的磁盘数量和最大磁盘单元数。请注意，降低此值不会删除控制器。默认值： 1 。

trans-unit.source: scsi_controller_scan_count - (Optional) The number of SCSI controllers to scan for disk attributes and controller types on. Default: 1.
trans-unit.target: scsi_controller_scan_count -（可选）要扫描磁盘属性和控制器类型的SCSI控制器的数量。默认值： 1 。

trans-unit.source: scsi_type - (Optional) The type of SCSI bus this virtual machine will have. Can be one of lsilogic (LSI Logic Parallel), lsilogic-sas (LSI Logic SAS) or pvscsi (VMware Paravirtual). Defualt: pvscsi.
trans-unit.target: scsi_type -（可选）此虚拟机将具有的SCSI总线的类型。可以是lsilogic（LSI Logic Parallel），lsilogic-sas（LSI Logic SAS）或pvscsi（VMware Paravirtual）中的一种。Defualt： pvscsi 。

trans-unit.source: scsi_type - The common type of all SCSI controllers on this virtual machine. Will be one of lsilogic (LSI Logic Parallel), lsilogic-sas (LSI Logic SAS), pvscsi (VMware Paravirtual), buslogic (BusLogic), or mixed when there are multiple controller types. Only the first number of controllers defined by scsi_controller_scan_count are scanned.
trans-unit.target: scsi_type -此虚拟机上所有SCSI控制器的通用类型。将其中 lsilogic （LSI Logic并行）， lsilogic-sas （LSI逻辑SAS）， pvscsi （VMware准虚拟）， buslogic （的BusLogic），或 mixed ，当有多个控制器的类型。仅扫描由 scsi_controller_scan_count 定义的第一个控制器。

trans-unit.source: sdrs_advanced_options - (Optional) A key/value map of advanced Storage DRS settings that are not exposed via Terraform or the vSphere client.
trans-unit.target: sdrs_advanced_options -（可选）未通过Terraform或vSphere Client公开的高级Storage DRS设置的键/值映射。

trans-unit.source: sdrs_automation_level - (Optional) Overrides any Storage DRS automation levels for this virtual machine. Can be one of automated or manual. When not specified, the datastore cluster's settings are used according to the specific SDRS subsystem.
trans-unit.target: sdrs_automation_level -（可选）覆盖此虚拟机的任何Storage DRS自动化级别。可以是 automated 或 manual 。如果未指定，则根据特定的SDRS子系统使用数据存储群集的设置。

trans-unit.source: sdrs_automation_level - (Optional) The global automation level for all virtual machines in this datastore cluster. Default: manual.
trans-unit.target: sdrs_automation_level -（可选）此数据存储群集中所有虚拟机的全局自动化级别。默认值： manual 。

trans-unit.source: sdrs_default_intra_vm_affinity - (Optional) When true, all disks in a single virtual machine will be kept on the same datastore. Default: true.
trans-unit.target: sdrs_default_intra_vm_affinity -（可选）为 true 时，单个虚拟机中的所有磁盘将保留在同一数据存储中。默认值： true 。

trans-unit.source: sdrs_enabled - (Optional) Enable Storage DRS for this datastore cluster. Default: false.
trans-unit.target: sdrs_enabled -（可选）为此数据存储群集启用存储DRS。默认值： false 。

trans-unit.source: sdrs_enabled - (Optional) Overrides the default Storage DRS setting for this virtual machine. When not specified, the datastore cluster setting is used.
trans-unit.target: sdrs_enabled -（可选）覆盖此虚拟机的默认Storage DRS设置。如果未指定，则使用数据存储群集设置。

trans-unit.source: sdrs_free_space_threshold - (Optional) The threshold, in GB, that storage DRS uses to make decisions to migrate VMs out of a datastore. Default: 50 GB.
trans-unit.target: sdrs_free_space_threshold -（可选）DRS用于决定将VM迁移出数据存储的存储的阈值（以GB为单位）。默认值： 50 GB。

trans-unit.source: sdrs_free_space_threshold - (Optional) The free space threshold to use. When set to utilization, drs_space_utilization_threshold is used, and when set to freeSpace, drs_free_space_threshold is used. Default: utilization.
trans-unit.target: sdrs_free_space_threshold -（可选）要使用的可用空间阈值。当设置为 utilization ， drs_space_utilization_threshold 被使用，并且当设置为 freeSpace ， drs_free_space_threshold 被使用。默认值： utilization 。

trans-unit.source: sdrs_free_space_utilization_difference - (Optional) The threshold, in percent of used space, that storage DRS uses to make decisions to migrate VMs out of a datastore. Default: 80 percent.
trans-unit.target: sdrs_free_space_utilization_difference -（可选）DRS用于决定将VM从数据存储中迁移出来的存储的阈值，以已用空间的百分比表示。默认值： 80 ％。

trans-unit.source: sdrs_free_space_utilization_difference - (Optional) The threshold, in percent, of difference between space utilization in datastores before storage DRS makes decisions to balance the space. Default: 5 percent.
trans-unit.target: sdrs_free_space_utilization_difference -（可选）在存储DRS决定平衡空间之前，数据存储中空间利用率之间的差异的阈值（以百分比为单位）。默认值： 5 ％。

trans-unit.source: sdrs_intra_vm_affinity - (Optional) Overrides the intra-VM affinity setting for this virtual machine. When true, all disks for this virtual machine will be kept on the same datastore. When false, Storage DRS may locate individual disks on different datastores if it helps satisfy cluster requirements. When not specified, the datastore cluster's settings are used.
trans-unit.target: sdrs_intra_vm_affinity -（可选）覆盖此虚拟机的VM内部亲和力设置。如果为 true ，则此虚拟机的所有磁盘将保留在同一数据存储中。如果为 false ，则Storage DRS如果可以帮助满足群集要求，则可以将各个磁盘放在不同的数据存储中。如果未指定，则使用数据存储群集的设置。

trans-unit.source: sdrs_io_balance_automation_level - (Optional) Overrides the default automation settings when correcting I/O load imbalances.
trans-unit.target: sdrs_io_balance_automation_level -（可选）在更正I / O负载不平衡时覆盖默认的自动化设置。

trans-unit.source: sdrs_io_latency_threshold - (Optional) The I/O latency threshold, in milliseconds, that storage DRS uses to make recommendations to move disks from this datastore. Default: 15 seconds.
trans-unit.target: sdrs_io_latency_threshold -（可选）DRS存储用来建议从该数据存储中移动磁盘的I / O延迟阈值（以毫秒为单位）。默认值： 15 秒。

trans-unit.source: sdrs_io_load_balance_enabled - (Optional) Enable I/O load balancing for this datastore cluster. Default: true.
trans-unit.target: sdrs_io_load_balance_enabled -（可选）为此数据存储群集启用I / O负载平衡。默认值： true 。

trans-unit.source: sdrs_io_load_imbalance_threshold - (Optional) The difference between load in datastores in the cluster before storage DRS makes recommendations to balance the load. Default: 5 percent.
trans-unit.target: sdrs_io_load_imbalance_threshold -（可选）在存储DRS提出平衡负载之前，群集中数据存储中负载之间的差异。默认值： 5 ％。

trans-unit.source: sdrs_io_reservable_iops_threshold - (Optional) The threshold of reservable IOPS of all virtual machines on the datastore before storage DRS makes recommendations to move VMs off of a datastore. Note that this setting should only be set if sdrs_io_reservable_percent_threshold cannot make an accurate estimate of the capacity of the datastores in your cluster, and should be set to roughly 50-60% of the worst case peak performance of the backing LUNs.
trans-unit.target: sdrs_io_reservable_iops_threshold -（可选）在存储DRS提出将VM从数据存储中移出的建议之前，数据存储中所有虚拟机的可保留IOPS的阈值。请注意，仅当 sdrs_io_reservable_percent_threshold 无法准确估计群集中数据存储的容量时，才应设置此设置，并且应将其设置为后备LUN最坏情况下峰值性能的大约50-60％。

trans-unit.source: sdrs_io_reservable_percent_threshold - (Optional) The threshold, in percent, of actual estimated performance of the datastore (in IOPS) that storage DRS uses to make recommendations to move VMs off of a datastore when the total reservable IOPS exceeds the threshold. Default: 60 percent.
trans-unit.target: sdrs_io_reservable_percent_threshold -（可选）阈值，以百分比表示，存储DRS用来建议在总可保留IOPS超过阈值时将VM从数据存储中移出的数据存储（IOPS中）的实际估计性能。默认值： 60 ％。

trans-unit.source: sdrs_io_reservable_threshold_mode - (Optional) The reservable IOPS threshold setting to use, sdrs_io_reservable_percent_threshold in the event of automatic, or sdrs_io_reservable_iops_threshold in the event of manual. Default: automatic.
trans-unit.target: sdrs_io_reservable_threshold_mode - （可选）预留IOPS阈值设置到使用， sdrs_io_reservable_percent_threshold 中的情况下 automatic ，或 sdrs_io_reservable_iops_threshold 中的事件 manual 。默认值： automatic 。

trans-unit.source: sdrs_load_balance_interval - (Optional) The storage DRS poll interval, in minutes. Default: 480 minutes.
trans-unit.target: sdrs_load_balance_interval -（可选）存储DRS轮询间隔，以分钟为单位。默认值： 480 分钟。

trans-unit.source: sdrs_policy_enforcement_automation_level - (Optional) Overrides the default automation settings when correcting storage and VM policy violations.
trans-unit.target: sdrs_policy_enforcement_automation_level -（可选）在更正存储和VM策略冲突时覆盖默认的自动化设置。

trans-unit.source: sdrs_rule_enforcement_automation_level - (Optional) Overrides the default automation settings when correcting affinity rule violations.
trans-unit.target: sdrs_rule_enforcement_automation_level -（可选）在更正相似性规则冲突时覆盖默认的自动化设置。

trans-unit.source: sdrs_space_balance_automation_level - (Optional) Overrides the default automation settings when correcting disk space imbalances.
trans-unit.target: sdrs_space_balance_automation_level -（可选）在纠正磁盘空间不平衡时覆盖默认的自动化设置。

trans-unit.source: sdrs_vm_evacuation_automation_level - (Optional) Overrides the default automation settings when generating recommendations for datastore evacuation.
trans-unit.target: sdrs_vm_evacuation_automation_level -（可选）在生成有关数据存储撤离的建议时覆盖默认的自动化设置。

trans-unit.source: se_linux_context - (Optional, block) SELinux labels of the container
trans-unit.target: se_linux_context -（可选，阻止）容器的SELinux标签

trans-unit.source: se_linux_options - (Optional) The SELinux context to be applied to all containers. If unspecified, the container runtime will allocate a random SELinux context for each container. May also be set in SecurityContext. If set in both SecurityContext and PodSecurityContext, the value specified in SecurityContext takes precedence for that container.
trans-unit.target: se_linux_options -（可选）将SELinux上下文应用于所有容器。如果未指定，则容器运行时将为每个容器分配一个随机的SELinux上下文。也可以在SecurityContext中设置。如果同时在SecurityContext和PodSecurityContext中设置，则SecurityContext中指定的值将优先于该容器。

trans-unit.source: search - (Optional, list of strings)A search list for host-name lookup.
trans-unit.target: search -（可选，字符串列表）用于主机名查找的搜索列表。

trans-unit.source: secret_key - This is the Alicloud secret key. It must be provided, but it can also be sourced from the ALICLOUD_SECRET_KEY environment variable.
trans-unit.target: secret_key -这是Alicloud的秘密密钥。必须提供它，但是也可以从 ALICLOUD_SECRET_KEY 环境变量获取它。

trans-unit.source: secret_key / AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY - (Optional) AWS secret access key.
trans-unit.target: secret_key / AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY -（可选）AWS秘密访问密钥。

trans-unit.source: secret_key (string) - (Optional) The contents of the secret key that is used by the Chef Client to decrypt data bags on the Chef Server. The key will be uploaded to the remote machine. This can also be loaded from a file on disk using the file() interpolation function.
trans-unit.target: secret_key (string) -（可选）Chef Client用来在Chef Server上解密数据包的密钥的内容。密钥将被上传到远程计算机。也可以使用 file() 插值函数从磁盘上的文件加载该文件。

trans-unit.source: secret_key_ref - (Optional) Selects a field of the pod: supports metadata.name, metadata.namespace, metadata.labels, metadata.annotations, spec.nodeName, spec.serviceAccountName, status.podIP..
trans-unit.target: secret_key_ref -（可选）选择窗格的字段：支持metas.name，metadata.namespace，metadata.labels，metadata.annotations，spec.nodeName，spec.serviceAccountName，status.podIP.。

trans-unit.source: secret_name - (Optional, string) The name of the secret that this references, but internally it is just provided for lookup/display purposes
trans-unit.target: secret_name -（可选，字符串）此名称所引用的秘密名称，但在内部仅出于查找/显示目的提供它

trans-unit.source: secret_name - (Required) The name of secret that contains Azure Storage Account Name and Key
trans-unit.target: secret_name -（必填）包含Azure存储帐户名称和密钥的密钥名称

trans-unit.source: secret_name - (Optional) Name of the secret in the pod's namespace to use. More info: http://kubernetes.io/docs/user-guide/volumes#secrets
trans-unit.target: secret_name -（可选）要使用的Pod命名空间中的密钥名称。更多信息： http : //kubernetes.io/docs/user-guide/volumes#secrets

trans-unit.source: secret_name - (Optional) Name of the secret in the pod's namespace to use. More info: http://kubernetes.io/docs/user-guide/volumes#secrets
trans-unit.target: secret_name -（可选）要使用的Pod命名空间中的机密名称。更多信息： http : //kubernetes.io/docs/user-guide/volumes#secrets

trans-unit.source: secret_permissions - (Required) List of secret permissions, must be one or more from the following: backup, delete, get, list, purge, recover, restore and set.
trans-unit.target: secret_permissions -（必需）秘密权限列表，必须是以下一项或多项： backup ， delete ， get ， list ， purge ， recover ， restore 和 set 。

trans-unit.source: secret_permissions - A list of secret permissions applicable to this Access Policy.
trans-unit.target: secret_permissions -适用于此访问策略的秘密权限列表。

trans-unit.source: secret_permissions - the secret permissions for the access policy
trans-unit.target: secret_permissions -访问策略的秘密权限

trans-unit.source: secret_properties - (Required) A secret_properties block as defined below.
trans-unit.target: secret_properties -（必需）如下定义的 secret_properties 块。

trans-unit.source: secret_ref - (Optional) Reference to the authentication secret for User, default is empty. More info: http://releases.k8s.io/HEAD/examples/volumes/cephfs/README.md#how-to-use-it
trans-unit.target: secret_ref -（可选）对用户的身份验证密码的引用，默认为空。更多信息： http : //releases.k8s.io/HEAD/examples/volumes/cephfs/README.md#how-to-use-it

trans-unit.source: secret_ref - (Optional) Reference to the secret object containing sensitive information to pass to the plugin scripts. This may be empty if no secret object is specified. If the secret object contains more than one secret, all secrets are passed to the plugin scripts.
trans-unit.target: secret_ref -（可选）对包含要传递给插件脚本的敏感信息的秘密对象的引用。如果未指定秘密对象，则该字段可以为空。如果秘密对象包含多个秘密，则所有秘密都将传递到插件脚本。

trans-unit.source: secret_ref - (Optional) Name of the authentication secret for RBDUser. If provided overrides keyring. Default is nil. More info: http://releases.k8s.io/HEAD/examples/volumes/rbd/README.md#how-to-use-it
trans-unit.target: secret_ref -（可选）RBDUser的身份验证密码的名称。如果提供的话，将覆盖密钥环。默认值为零。更多信息： http : //releases.k8s.io/HEAD/examples/volumes/rbd/README.md#how-to-use-it

trans-unit.source: secret_string - (Required) Specifies text data that you want to encrypt and store in this version of the secret.
trans-unit.target: secret_string -（必需）指定要在此版本的密钥中加密和存储的文本数据。

trans-unit.source: secret_string - The decrypted part of the protected secret information that was originally provided as a string.
trans-unit.target: secret_string -受保护的机密信息的解密部分，最初以字符串形式提供。

trans-unit.source: secret_url - (Required) The URL to the Key Vault Secret used as the Disk Encryption Key. This can be found as id on the azurerm_key_vault_secret resource.
trans-unit.target: secret_url -（必需）用作磁盘加密密钥的Key Vault Secret的URL。可以在 azurerm_key_vault_secret 资源上找到它作为 id 。

trans-unit.source: secret_value - (Required) The secret value (password) of the account.
trans-unit.target: secret_value -（必填）帐户的秘密值（密码）。

trans-unit.source: secrets - (Optional, set of blocks) See Secrets below for details.
trans-unit.target: secrets -（可选，块集）有关详细信息，请参见下面的机密。

trans-unit.source: section_type - (Required) Type of the rules which a section can contain. Either LAYER2 or LAYER3. Only homogeneous sections are supported.
trans-unit.target: section_type -（必需）部分可以包含的规则的类型。LAYER2或LAYER3。仅支持同质截面。

trans-unit.source: secure - (Optional) Set visibility of the variable value to true or false.
trans-unit.target: secure -（可选）将变量值的可见性设置为 true 或 false 。

trans-unit.source: secure_json_data - (Required by some data source types) The access and secret keys required to access the data source. secure_json_data is documented in more detail below.
trans-unit.target: secure_json_data -（某些数据源类型必需）访问数据源所需的访问密钥和秘密密钥。 secure_json_data 在下面更详细地记录。

trans-unit.source: secured_port - (Optional) Secured Port for accessing the WebLogic Server. The default value is 7002.
trans-unit.target: secured_port （可选）用于访问WebLogic Server的安全端口。默认值为7002。

trans-unit.source: secured_port - (Optional) Secured listener port for the load balancer for accessing deployed applications using HTTPS.
trans-unit.target: secured_port （可选）负载均衡器的安全侦听器端口，用于使用HTTPS访问已部署的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: security_context - (Optional) SecurityContext holds pod-level security attributes and common container settings. Optional: Defaults to empty
trans-unit.target: security_context -（可选）SecurityContext保存窗格级别的安全属性和公共容器设置。可选：默认为空

trans-unit.target: security_context -（可选）与Pod一起运行的安全性选项。更多信息： http : //releases.k8s.io/HEAD/docs/design/security_context.md

trans-unit.source: security_group_id - (Optional) Specifies the security group ID. The value is a string of 1 to 200 characters that consists of uppercase and lowercase letters, digits, and hyphens (-). This parameter is mandatory only when type is set to Internal.
trans-unit.target: security_group_id -（可选）指定安全组ID。字符串形式，取值范围是1〜200个字符，由大写字母，小写字母，数字和连字符（-）组成。仅当将type设置为Internal时，此参数是必需的。

trans-unit.source: security_group_id - (Optional) Specifies the security group ID. The value is a string of 1 to 200 characters that consists of uppercase and lowercase letters, digits, and hyphens (-). This parameter is mandatory only when type is set to Internal. Changing this creates a new elb loadbalancer.
trans-unit.target: security_group_id -（可选）指定安全组ID。字符串形式，取值范围是1〜200个字符，由大写字母，小写字母，数字和连字符（-）组成。仅当将type设置为Internal时，此参数是必需的。更改此设置将创建一个新的Elb负载平衡器。

trans-unit.source: security_ips - (Optional) List of IP addresses allowed to access all databases of an instance. The list contains up to 1,000 IP addresses, separated by commas. Supported formats include 0.0.0.0/0, 10.23.12.24 (IP), and 10.23.12.24/24 (Classless Inter-Domain Routing (CIDR) mode. /24 represents the length of the prefix in an IP address. The range of the prefix length is [1,32]).
trans-unit.target: security_ips -（可选）允许访问实例的所有数据库的IP地址列表。该列表最多包含1,000个IP地址，以逗号分隔。支持的格式包括0.0.0.0/0、10.23.12.24（IP）和10.23.12.24/24（无类域间路由（CIDR）模式。/24表示IP地址中前缀的长度。前缀长度为[1,32]）。

trans-unit.source: seed - (Optional) Arbitrary string with which to seed the random number generator, in order to produce less-volatile permutations of the list. Important: Even with an identical seed, it is not guaranteed that the same permutation will be produced across different versions of Terraform. This argument causes the result to be less volatile, but not fixed for all time.
trans-unit.target: seed -（可选）用于生成随机数生成器种子的任意字符串，以便产生列表的不稳定的排列。重要说明：即使使用相同的种子，也不能保证会在不同版本的Terraform中产生相同的排列。此参数使结果的波动性较小，但并非始终固定。

trans-unit.source: selection_pattern - (Optional) Specifies the regular expression pattern used to choose an integration response based on the response from the backend. Setting this to - makes the integration the default one. If the backend is an AWS Lambda function, the AWS Lambda function error header is matched. For all other HTTP and AWS backends, the HTTP status code is matched.
trans-unit.target: selection_pattern -（可选）指定用于基于来自后端的响应来选择集成响应的正则表达式模式。将此设置为 - 使集成成为默认值。如果后端是 AWS Lambda函数，则匹配AWS Lambda函数错误标头。对于所有其他 HTTP 和 AWS 后端，将匹配HTTP状态代码。

trans-unit.source: services - (Optional, Type: list, Conflicts with document) List of services which can assume the RAM role. The format of each item in this list is ${service}.aliyuncs.com or ${account_id}@${service}.aliyuncs.com, such as ecs.aliyuncs.com and 1234567890000@ots.aliyuncs.com. The ${service} can be ecs, log, apigateway and so on, the ${account_id} refers to someone's Alicloud account id.
trans-unit.target: services -（可选，类型：列表，与 document 冲突）可以担当RAM角色的服务列表。此列表中每个项目的格式为 ${service}.aliyuncs.com 或 ${account_id}@${service}.aliyuncs.com ，例如 ecs.aliyuncs.com 和 1234567890000@ots.aliyuncs.com 。在 ${service} 可以 ecs ， log ， apigateway 等，在 ${account_id} 是指某人的Alicloud帐户ID。

trans-unit.source: shared_credentials_file - (Optional) This is the path to the shared credentials file. If this is not set and a profile is specified, ~/.aws/credentials will be used.

trans-unit.source: shared_key - (Optional) The shared IPSec key. A key must be provided if a Site-to-Site or VNet-to-VNet connection is created whereas ExpressRoute connections do not need a shared key.
trans-unit.target: shared_key -（可选）共享的IPSec密钥。如果创建了站点到站点或VNet到VNet的连接，则必须提供密钥，而ExpressRoute连接不需要共享密钥。

trans-unit.source: shared_key - (Optional) The shared key. Can be a maximum of 25 characters.
trans-unit.target: shared_key -（可选）共享密钥。最多可以包含25个字符。

trans-unit.source: shared_network - (Required) Whether or not the interface is inside the Shared Network or an IP Network.

trans-unit.source: shield - (Optional) The POP of the shield designated to reduce inbound load.

trans-unit.source: should_resume_stateful - (Required) This will apply resuming action for Stateful instances in the Elastigroup upon scale up or capacity changes. Example usage will be for Elastigroups that will have scheduling rules to set a target capacity of 0 instances in the night and automatically restore the same state of the instances in the morning.
trans-unit.target: should_resume_stateful -（必需）这将在扩展或容量更改时对Elastigroup中的有状态实例应用恢复操作。用法示例将用于具有调度规则的弹性组，该规则将夜间的目标容量设置为0个实例，并在早晨自动恢复实例的相同状态。

trans-unit.source: should_roll - (Required) Sets the enablement of the roll option.
trans-unit.target: should_roll -（必需）设置roll选项的启用。

trans-unit.source: shrink_ok - (Optional) Verifies if the disk volume is allowed to shrink when resizing (defaults false).
trans-unit.target: shrink_ok （可选）验证在调整大小时是否允许缩小磁盘卷（默认为false）。

trans-unit.source: shutdown - shutdown gracefully
trans-unit.target: shutdown -正常关闭

trans-unit.source: shutdown_wait_timeout - (Optional) The amount of time, in minutes, to wait for a graceful guest shutdown when making necessary updates to the virtual machine. If force_power_off is set to true, the VM will be force powered-off after this timeout, otherwise an error is returned. Default: 3 minutes.
trans-unit.target: shutdown_wait_timeout -（可选）在对虚拟机进行必要的更新时等待正常的来宾关闭的时间（以分钟为单位）。如果 force_power_off 设置为true，则在此超时后将强制关闭VM，否则将返回错误。默认值：3分钟。

trans-unit.source: sid (Optional) - An ID for the policy statement.
trans-unit.target: sid （可选）-策略声明的ID。

trans-unit.source: sid - (Optional) Database Name for the Database Cloud Service instance. Default value is ORCL.
trans-unit.target: sid -（可选）数据库云服务实例的数据库名称。默认值为 ORCL 。

trans-unit.source: signature - (Optional) The base64-encoded SHA256 RSA signature of the instance identity document to authenticate with, with all newline characters removed. Can be retrieved from the EC2 metadata server.
trans-unit.target: signature -（可选）用于身份验证的实例身份文档的base64编码的SHA256 RSA签名，已删除所有换行符。可以从EC2元数据服务器中检索。

trans-unit.source: signed - Whether audio samples are represented with negative and positive numbers (signed) or only positive numbers (unsigned). The supported value is Signed. (PCM Only)
trans-unit.target: signed -音频样本是用负数和正数（带符号）还是仅用正数（无符号）表示。支持的值为“签名”。（仅限PCM）

trans-unit.source: signed_url - The signed URL that can be used to access the storage object without authentication.
trans-unit.target: signed_url -签名的URL，无需身份验证即可用于访问存储对象。

trans-unit.source: signing_algorithm - (Required) Name of the algorithm your private CA uses to sign certificate requests. Valid values can be found in the ACM PCA Documentation.
trans-unit.target: signing_algorithm -（必需）您的私有CA用于签署证书请求的算法的名称。有效值可以在 ACM PCA文档中找到。

trans-unit.source: signum(integer) - Returns -1 for negative numbers, 0 for 0 and 1 for positive numbers. This function is useful when you need to set a value for the first resource and a different value for the rest of the resources. Example: element(split(",", var.r53_failover_policy), signum(count.index)) where the 0th index points to PRIMARY and 1st to FAILOVER
trans-unit.target: signum(integer) -返回 -1 为负数， 0 为 0 和 1 为正数。当您需要为第一个资源设置一个值而为其余资源设置一个不同的值时，此功能很有用。示例： element(split(",", var.r53_failover_policy), signum(count.index)) ，其中第0个索引指向 PRIMARY ，第一个索引指向 FAILOVER

trans-unit.source: silence_time - Notification silence period in the alarm state, in seconds. Valid value range: [300, 86400]. Default to 86400
trans-unit.target: silence_time -警报状态下的通知静音期，以秒为单位。有效值范围：[300，86400]。默认为86400

trans-unit.source: silence_time - Notification silence period in the alarm state.
trans-unit.target: silence_time -警报状态下的通知静音期。

trans-unit.source: single_placement_group - (Optional) Specifies whether the scale set is limited to a single placement group with a maximum size of 100 virtual machines. If set to false, managed disks must be used. Defaults to true. Changing this forces a new resource to be created. See documentation for more information.
trans-unit.target: single_placement_group -（可选）指定缩放比例集是否限于最大大小为100个虚拟机的单个放置组。如果设置为false，则必须使用托管磁盘。默认为 true 。更改此选项将强制创建新资源。请参阅文档以获取更多信息。

trans-unit.target: size （必需）此存储卷的大小，以GB为单位。允许的范围是1 GB到2 TB（2048 GB）。

trans-unit.source: size - (Optional) Size of data disk, in GB. The value ranges from 5 to 2,000 for a cloud disk and from 5 to 1,024 for an ephemeral disk. A maximum of four values can be entered.
trans-unit.target: size -（可选）数据磁盘的大小，以GB为单位。对于云磁盘，该值的范围是5到2,000，对于临时磁盘，该值的范围是5到1,024。最多可以输入四个值。

trans-unit.source: size - (Optional) Size of the persistent disk, specified in GB. You can specify this field when creating a persistent disk using the sourceImage or sourceSnapshot parameter, or specify it alone to create an empty persistent disk.
trans-unit.target: size -（可选）永久磁盘的大小，以GB为单位。您可以在使用sourceImage或sourceSnapshot参数创建永久磁盘时指定此字段，也可以单独指定以创建空的永久磁盘。

trans-unit.target: size -（可选）要显示的结果数。最大值为1000。默认值为50
